summary: Y’all, I must’ve been wildly sleep deprived last night to gif this scene like I did. He just looks like the fluffiest, softest...
caption: Y’all, I must’ve been wildly sleep deprived last night to gif this scene like I did. He just looks like the fluffiest, softest bobble head in the world with infinite eyebrow wiggle.

blog.name: tyrus-trash
blog.title: sup
blog.description: also just cyrus trash in general; 18 yrs old; she/her; cancer ♋

tags: it actually ended with cyrus flipping his classmates off as he left
but i figured that was too OOC
summary: imagine high school senior!Cyrus in a bad mood because he slept through his alarm & he’s running late, but he didn’t eat...
body:
imagine high school senior!Cyrus in a bad mood because he slept through his alarm & he’s running late, but he didn’t eat breakfast so he stops in the cafeteria to grab a muffin real quick.

tj is just about to head to class when he sees cyrus going for a muffin, and he thinks back to that first time they met. he remembers how nervous cyrus was to get the muffin, and he remembers how cyrus closed in on himself when their peers started protesting. so, even though it’s been years since then & cyrus has become more confident in himself, tj lingers just in case some people start yelling at cyrus again & he has to step in and help.

and when cyrus grabs the last muffin from the tray, those waiting in line do just that. they shout and whine in protest, some going as far as to step out of line to try and stop cyrus. tj steps toward the situation, but he stops in his tracks at the sight of cyrus goodman biting into the muffin while glaring at whoever was yelling at him before stalking off toward tj.

“morning,” cyrus calls with a smile as he passes quickly.

and wow, tj loves that guy

blog.name: nineteenohtwo
blog.title: "Comedic Timing"
blog.description: El (she/her) - writing sideblog - plant enthusiast - '00 - member of the protect Raquel police - send me prompts or smth pls

summary: update your fic masterlist!!!
question: update your fic masterlist!!!
answer:
WIP’s

1. One for the road: 

“So, are you excited?”
“Man, I can’t believe that our parents allowed us to make a road trip without supervision.”
“I mean, if mom could take time off, she would be here in the car with us. Visiting colleges is important,” Cyrus said, happily munching on his French fries, “even if we only visit NYU for a little bit and blow the rest of our time in New York.”
“We’re also blowing our time in Chicago,” TJ said, “and maybe Cleveland.”

Road Trip AU - feelings, music, food, fights, and a lot of driving.

2. Paint me in trust:

“Fifty.”
“Fifty what?”
Reed smirked. “Fifty dollars per day you take Cyrus out.”
“You’re a real asshole, you know that, right?”
“So, you’ll do it?”
“Yeah,” TJ bit his lip, thinking of his mom and sister. “Yeah, sure, I’ll do it.”

10 Things I Hate About You AU

Finished chaptered fics

3. Some of us are looking at the stars:

“Andi, I love you, but you don’t understand. I am going to die,” Cyrus said, glaring at his schedule, as if it had betrayed him.

“You have Potions with the Slytherins. That’s not a disaster, Cyrus,” Andi said in disbelief.

Mandatory Hogwarts AU

4. There’s so much happiness that we are still yet to find:

“TJ has been offered a basketball scholarship to NYU, coincidentally the same university you’re trying to get into.”
“Congrats.” Cyrus said dryly, and TJ, polite despite Cyrus’ expectations, nodded back.
“To qualify for that scholarship TJ needs a C+ average in Calc 1, and he’s not getting there.” She looked at TJ who stared blankly ahead with a thin-lipped grimace, clearly uncomfortable, “and since you’re one of my best students, I think it would be good for you to maybe… tutor him?”

Written for the Valentines Exchange

One shots

5. And it’s funny how lightning seems to bring out the very softest side of you:

“You need to find someone to practice with. Just find someone who isn’t that experienced either and kiss them. Then you both won’t have high expectations for each other and you can ease into it. And then you won’t be nervous next time you have the opportunity to kiss someone.”
“But who?”
Cyrus pondered it over and felt the blood rushing to his face. He sat up straight on the bed and bit his lip in a nervous habit he desperately needed to kick. He looked at TJ and tilted his head, trying to convey the message without actually having to say the words.
“What?” TJ said, pausing his pacing to look at Cyrus’ weird behaviour, “Why are you looking at me like that?”
Cyrus swiped his tongue over his bottom lip and looked away, “You know… I wouldn’t be… Uhm, opposed to helping out.”

Practice kissing AU

6. We could be anything:

“You can’t be serious, Cy. You’re kidding me. You have to be kidding me. Please say you’re joking.”
“TJ isn’t my boyfriend.”
“Did you break up? He would’ve mentioned that to me.”
“We were never together!” Cyrus shouted, feeling like he had fallen victim to an elaborate prank, or perhaps woke up in a parallel universe. “TJ and I have never dated, why do you think that?”
“Well,” she opened her mouth and closed it again several times, obviously thinking of something to say, “I really think you should tell TJ that you’re not dating, because he doesn’t seem to be on the same page as you.”

Tumblr Prompt: TJ thinks he’s dating Cyrus but Cyrus thinks TJ is just being a really close friend.

7. Give me the worst of you:

TJ’s knuckles were split open. He was sitting on Cyrus’ kitchen table, his legs dangling in the air, and his unharmed left hand pressing a tissue against his bleeding nose while Cyrus rushed around in his kitchen, in search of an ice pack, water and a first aid kit.

“You’re a fucking idiot, starting a fight like that after a game, where everybody could see.” Cyrus said, his tone bitter, even though his hands were handling him with utmost care, cleaning TJ’s hands up, making sure not to touch the wounds. “You’re going to get yourself kicked off the team.”

Cyrus and TJ have a bad fight, get some sense knocked into them by their friends, and make up.

8. The sun will come up, the seasons will change:

“Where are we? What is this?” Cyrus asked.
“This is an emergency cabin,” TJ said, taking off his boots, coat, helmet and gloves, trying to turn on the central heating system in the middle of the room. “We’ll be here for a while.”
“A while?” Cyrus repeated, also taking off his outer wear, “How long is a while, TJ Kippen?”

AU where Cyrus and TJ get caught in a blizzard on a school organised ski trip, and have to stay in an emergency cabin together for a couple of days

9. The one where TJ calls Cyrus babe:

“You should tell me when you’re free,” Cyrus said, “I’m always asking you to come over and half of the time you’re at practice.”

“Next time, babe,” TJ smiled around his straw, blissfully unaware of the verbal bomb he just dropped.

Buffy, who was about to take a bite out of her burger, stilled mid-motion and slowly put it back down on her plate. Her face was scrunched up, her lips squeezed into a thin line, as if she was holding back a big laugh.

TJ accidentally calls Cyrus babe. It’s clearly the end of the world.

10. Oh, it felt forever, baby:

It wasn’t that he didn’t want to participate in the festivities, but he was completely fed up. He didn’t want to stay, but he couldn’t just fuck off and leave, because he had no clue where Cyrus was.
Fucking Reed.

House Party AU

blog.name: tj-smitten
blog.title: is there anything you wanna tell me
blog.description: tyrus is canon i'm crying wbu || she/her || likes/follows/replies from @gelbekritzelei (main)

tags: i'm still not over it...... they really did that
summary: it’s that time again where i just have to take a step back and marvel at the absolute ICONICITY presented in the fact that when...
body:
it’s that time again where i just have to take a step back and marvel at the absolute ICONICITY presented in the fact that when tj was introduced he seemed like a character that was gonna be there for like 3 episodes to give buffy a Hardship To Overcome but no he’s actually the other gay one we’ve been waiting for like.

when tj first appeared and someone had told me that it was him i would absolutely have lost my gotdam mind

it’s that time again where i just have to take a step back and marvel at the absolute ICONICITY presented in the fact that when tj was introduced he seemed like a character that was gonna be there for like 3 episodes to give buffy a Hardship To Overcome but no he’s actually the other gay one we’ve been waiting for like.

when tj first appeared and someone had told me that it was him i would absolutely have lost my gotdam mind

summary: Here’s a Cursed Thing That I wrote a while back:
body:
Here’s a Cursed Thing That I wrote a while back:

Andi is really handy.

Buffy is not fluffy.

Cyrus has a friend named Iris.

Jonah has a fake persona.

TJ is kind of gay.

Marty likes to party.

Bex has an ex.

Amber has a hammer.

Ham likes to say “damn.”

CeCe goes to D.C.

Bowie is very cozy.

Gus rides in a bus.

Miranda causes propaganda.

Feel free to add on

summary: Throw me the sexuality headcanon for each AM character my dude
question: Throw me the sexuality headcanon for each AM character my dude
answer:
Alright Lets Go

Cyrus- Gay (its canon)

TJ-Gay

Buffy - Straight Ace

Andi- Pan

Amber - Bi

Jonah- Bi Bi Bi

Marty- Bi and Trans

Iris- Gives off big lesbian vibes (plus i dont want her to actually have had romantic feelings for Cyrus because i would imagine she would be heartbroken after he ran away)

Walker- Pan

Gus- Aro

Bex- Bi

Bowie- Bi

Worst People in the show

Miranda- secretly a lesbian in love with bex

Kira-Homophobic (Wait that not a sexuality) Straight

And thats all the chacters that have said 1 line or more

summary: Tori’s recent update in the twitter au?
question: Tori’s recent update in the twitter au?
answer:
Ooof I love Toris aus so much they are always so lengthy and beautiful

Of course when it starts looking up like they like each other and it’s not so fake, of course they break up over misunderstandings

I love and hate it like ofc I hate said angsts Tyrus but god I love it like it’s good writing and juicy.

Anyone who hasn’t should check out Tori on Twitter (@tyruspng) the other aus are amazing too 👊🏼💖
